scripts.initDb: docker exec -i bachus-winery57 mysql -utest -ptest  <<< 'drop database if exists bachusWinery;create database bachusWinery' && docker exec -i bachus-winery57 mysql -utest -ptest bachusWinery < ./src/sql/bachusWinery2.sql
scripts.initDb-win: bash -c "docker.exe exec -i bachus-winery57 mysql -utest -ptest  <<< 'drop database if exists bachusWinery;create database bachusWinery' && docker.exe exec -i bachus-winery57 mysql -utest -ptest bachusWinery < ./src/sql/bachusWinery2.sql"
scripts.initDb-toolbox: docker exec -i bachus-winery57 mysql -utest -ptest -e "drop database if exists bachusWinery;CREATE DATABASE bachusWinery" bachusWinery && docker exec -i bachus-winery57 mysql -utest -ptest bachusWinery < ".\src\sql\bachusWinery2.sql"
